overview:
Armed with extensive software engineering, project management and business development experience coupled with a passion for technology, my goal is to continue building on a proven track record of successfully managing the application of appropriate technological solutions in a product/project-oriented environment.

Specialties

  • Accounting & Finance
  • Supervising, mentoring, recruiting, evaluating & motivating high-energy teams
  • Gov’t grant/subsidy programs, e.g. SR&ED, IRAP
  • DB, data warehousing and BI technologies
  • Project Management and use of Earned Value
  • Budget creation/mgmt
  • Systems analysis & design using a variety of methodologies, including agile techniques lilke SCRUM
  • Product mgmt , marketing & sales, including RFP responses
  • Customer relationship building
  • Classroom teaching & course development

degrees.subject: Computer Science
degrees.institution: State University of New York at Oswego
